metadata.title: CVE-2017-16926 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Ohcount 3.0.0 is prone to a command injection via specially craftedfilenames containing shell metacharacters, which can be exploited by anattacker (providing a source tree for Ohcount processing) to executearbitrary code as the user running Ohcount.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16926` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ohcount - 3.1.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ohcount package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.0-2').
